MR DS Pre-order?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2010 Topics (Year of the Shock Rock): MR DS Pre-order?
By Levin on Friday, August 6, 2010 - 07:54 am:

I apologize if this question has been asked but I didn't see it asked as far as I could tell..anyways, for those who pre-ordered the game, did you get any pre-order bonuses with it or did they not do any pre-order bonuses for the game?

By Shen the Keeper on Friday, August 6, 2010 - 08:01 am:

I didn't get any pre-order bonus for it. I even remembered to ask the second gamestop I picked it up from if there were any (I reserved two copies).

So either my local gamestops are slackers or there weren't any.

By Penguin God on Friday, August 6, 2010 - 08:51 am:

There weren't any pre order bonuses for this game, it's kind of a small title for that sort of thing.

By fiffa46 on Friday, August 6, 2010 - 01:05 pm:

My wife is picking it up after work so in about an hour and a half I'll be playing. ^_^
